000 - Just sit right back and you’ll hear a tale,

A tale of a yuletide trip

That started from a tropic port,

Aboard this tiny ship

001 - Santa and his helpful elves

To Geese Islands did go

002 - Continuing their merry work

O'er sand instead of snow

003 - New this year: a shiny tool

The elves logged in with glee

004 - What makes short work of many tasks?

It's ChatNPT.  *It's ChatNPT*

005 - From images to APIs

This AI made elves glad

006 - But motivations were unknown

So was it good or bad?

007 - Could it be that NPT

Was not from off-the-shelf?

008 - Though we'll forgive and trust again

We'd found a naughty elf

009 - This fancy AI tool of ours

With all our work remained

010 - Not good or bad, our online friend

Just did as it was trained

011 - Surely someone's taint must be

Upon our AI crutch
